title: Verbal communication: the power of words
creator_credit: CRM Productions, Stephen Judson and Peter Jordan
brief_description: Uses animation, humorous vignettes, and dramatized slices of organizational life to illustrate the four critical parts of every verbal exchange: the speaker, the language used, the atmosphere, and the listener. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
